post.title: My first .bit domain
post.body:
This blog is now available on [angristan.bit](http://127.0.0.1:43110/angristan.bit) !
As I don't own NameCoins, I purchased it on [PeerName](https://peername.com/).

Then I set it up with [this article](http://127.0.0.1:43110/cryptonbits.bit/?Post:4:How+to+connect+your+.bit+domain+with+your+Zeronet+site) and [this article](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1QLLPpowM6BWxKYKops1WkCafuFPhFBnAx/?Post:3:Using+.bit+domains)

It's so cool :D

post.title: Hello everyone
post.body:
Hey !
I'm Angristan, from France. Testing out Zeronet and ZeroBlog.
